title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 28.4 - Use of unauthorized name
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 28.4 - Use of unauthorized name

State Regulations

No bail agent shall use any name in conducting a bail agent business that has not been previously approved by the superintendent or any name that is not the individual bail agent's legal name. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
28.4

Adopted

New

York State Register November 20, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 47, eff. 3/19/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
